snippet.title: Kraken Academy!! Steam Trailer
snippet.description:
You're the new kid at school who gets time travel powers from a magical kraken! Kraken Academy!! is a groundhog-day adventure inspired by 90s comedy anime. Coming to Steam & Nintendo Switch

Wishlist here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1158220/Kraken_Academy/

Twitter: https://twitter.com/happybroccgames

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/happybroccoligames/
